--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> So did I.  Let's make this a little better: Windlord, Nightlight, 
Perplex, 
> and Termitron are far away from the ship near some caves.  Trinity, 
Zeni, 
> Gramps, Deemos, and Aerotaur are at the ship.  I know there are 
some 
> inconsistencies but if we leave them where they are now it will be 
less of a 
> pain.  If I've forgotten anyone their controller will figure it out.
